name: Ratchet & Clank Bolt Multiplier Prototype
description:
My attempt at recreating the bolt multiplier mechanic from the challenge modes in the Ratchet & Clank Franchise. Made with Cinemachine and Probuilder. Supports controller/gamepad.

Controls:

Mouse & keyboard

WASD - Move

Mouse - Move the camera

Spacebar - Jump

Left mouse button - shoot

Right mouse button - Zoom in

PS5(Not recommended)

X - Jump

Left joystick - Move

Right joystick - Move the camera

R1 - shoot

L1 - Zoom in
